name: Sailor Simulator
detailed_description:
Check out the games

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1103820/Big_Battle_And_Defence_Simulator/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1067760/Siege_Machines_Builder/
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1101120/Gunsmith_Simulator/


About the Game

If you would like to prove yourself as a sailor on a medieval ship - you are in the right place! You'll be able to take care of every aspect of steering a large ship by yourself. You must also remember to keep your ship in good condition! Take care of the deck, sails, rigging, masts and so on. Set sails, raise the anchor and look for favorable winds!

Main features

  • Sail your own ship. Take care of its condition, carry out repairs.
  • Navigate your ship on a huge ocean. Discover new islands, cities, and towns.
  • Make your own modifications. Buy new sails, better rigging and more cool stuff.
  • Transport goods and make money.
  • Watch out for pirates! Choose safe routes or fight them!
  • Buy new ships. This will allow you to make more profitable orders!

Are you interested?
